asgiref.wsgi

Classes

WsgiToAsgi

Wraps a WSGI application to make it into an ASGI application.

WsgiToAsgiInstance

Per-socket instance of a wrapped WSGI application

Wraps a WSGI application to make it into an ASGI application.

wsgi_application[source]
response_started = False[source]
response_content_length = None[source]
build_environ(scope, body)[source]

Builds a scope and request body into a WSGI environ object.

start_response(status, response_headers, exc_info=None)[source]

WSGI start_response callable.

run_wsgi_app(body)[source]

Called in a subthread to run the WSGI app. We encapsulate like this so that the start_response callable is called in the same thread.
